snippet: Victoria Azarenka’s coach said the No. 2 women’s player had fluid and “a strain” in her right knee and hip from her slip in her first-round match at Wimbledon.
abstract: Victoria Azarenka’s coach said the No. 2 women’s player had fluid and “a strain” in her right knee and hip from her slip in her first-round match at Wimbledon.

headline.main: Coach Calls Azarenka's Injury 'Nothing Too Serious'
